scripts.dev:start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix "[{name}]" --names "DB,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:db:watch" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d db && sleep 5 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm flyway migrate
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix fitness-tracker-backend && npm install --prefix fitness-tracker-frontend
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run migrate && npm run dev:start
